original_title: Sparkle of Christmas in three stunning new collections
original_body_lines: CJS unveiled three spectacular collections for the Christmas season combining the stunning beauty of the Orca and the majestic leopard together with The Christmas Wish Collection, which showcased a magnificent gem-studded collection to add flair and style for the Christmas season. CJS also opened a new pop-up space – The Jewel Loft – on the fourth floor of the CJS Heritage Store to showcase designs by emerging jewellery designers.

Pandas of the Sea and The Leopard pendants feature two majestic beings from the sea and land – the Orca and the leopard – who are threatened with extinction; the orca specifically is critically endangered. International award-winning marine biologist, NatGeo explorer and pioneer of blue whale research in the Northern Indian ocean, Founder of Oceanswell Dr Asha de Vos who has been collaborating with CJS on marine conservation efforts, joined Chairman of CJS Akram Cassim to unveil the fifty limited edition Orca pendants set with blue sapphires in handcrafted sterling silver.
Tourist Service Center and Welcome Center in North Central Province
